block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$1,277,500 684 Broadway (Third Street) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,800-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; home office, 10-ft. ceilings, maple plank floors, French doors, washer/dryer in apartment; maintenance $1,491, 48% tax-deductible; listed at $1.295 million, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$1,277,500 684 Broadway (Third Street) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,800-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; home office, 10-ft. ceilings, maple plank floors, French doors, washer/dryer in apartment; maintenance $1,491, 48% tax-deductible; listed at $1.295 million, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$479,000 201 East 28th Street (Chesapeake) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, eat-in kitchen, solarium, h/w floors, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,030, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $479,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$4.5 million 15 East 69th Street (Westbury) 4-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 2,320-sq.-ft. condo in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen, mahogany floors, 2 exposures, wine cellar, health club; common charges $2,320; taxes $28,104; listed at $4.4 million (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Broker: William B. May)

$1.244 million 200 East 89th Street (Monarch) 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 2,100-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, balcony, East River view; common charges $1,280; taxes $11,400; listed at $1.295 million, 1 year on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$375,000 333 West 57th Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, renovated kitchen and bath, sunken living room, 2 exposures; maintenance $872, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $389,000, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Bellmarc)

$215,000 2073 Matthews Avenue 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 70-year-old house; dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 1-car garage, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,200; listed at $225,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Heritage First/Better Homes and Gardens)

$122,500 3050 Fairfield Avenue (Tangier) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; part-time doormen, dining area, h/w floors, enclosed terrace, 2 exposures; maintenance $820, 46% tax-deductible; listed at $125,000, 9 weeks on market (Broker: Susan E. Goldy)

$370,000 242 11th Street 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 3-story turn-of-the-century row house; dining room, oak floors, original moldings and detail, rear deck, 17-by-80-ft. lot; taxes $1,100; listed at $379,000, 10 weeks on market (Broker: Elaine Gay)

$367,000 50 Plaza Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; part-time doormen, dining area, windowed kitchen, parquet floors, original moldings and detail; maintenance $1,055, 58% tax-deductible; listed at $389,000, 1 week on market (Broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$373,000 9 Sherman Street 2-family, 2-story prewar house; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, eat-in kitchen, oak floors in each unit; rear deck, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,060; listed at $339,000 (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Joseph Berman)

$300,000 8-08 College Place 2-family, 2-story, postwar wood-frame house; 3 bedrooms, 1 bath in each unit; finished basement, 29-by-125-ft. lot; taxes $1,808, listed at $319,000, 1 week on market (Broker: PCA Realty)

$278,000 151-12 20th Street 4-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 80-year-old aluminum-sided house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,556; listed at $279,500, 5 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$230,000 109 Notus Avenue 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 20-year-old colonial; dining area, eat-in kitchen, family room, finished basement, 25-by-94-ft. lot; taxes $1,411; listed at $239,000, 13 weeks on market (Brokers: Hugh Kim; Kingsley)

$167,000 100 East Hartsdale Avenue 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 31-year-old co-op; entry foyer, terrace, dining area, breakfast nook, den, garage parking space; maintenance $588, 60% tax-deductible; listed at $169,000; 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Prudential Centennial; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$425,000 54 Kathleen Lane 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 45-year-old split-level; entry hall, cathedral ceiling, dining area, country kitchen, family room, sun room, skylight, powder room; 1-acre lot; taxes $8,631; listed at $449,900; 8 weeks on market (Brokers: Randolph Properties; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$665,000 226 Highbrook Avenue 6-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 92-year-old colonial; center hall, 2 fireplaces, heated sun room, dining room, modern eat-in kitchen, deck, powder room; 75-by-144-ft. lot; taxes $14,285; listed at $665,000; 1 week on market (Broker: C. S. McClellan)

$437,000 22 Everett Street 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 36-year-old colonial; center hall, marble fireplace, dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, enclosed porch, patio, 2-car garage; 125-by-60-ft. lot; taxes $9,474; listed at $459,500; 17 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Ragette)

$200,000 6 Lakeview Drive 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 25-year-old Cape Cod; eat-in kitchen, h/w floors, new electric system, 1.1-acre lot on cul-de-sac overlooking wooded public land; taxes $2,308; listed at $205,000, 4 weeks on market (Brokers: William Raveis; Realty Seven)

$615,000 15 Susan Lane 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 54-year-old split-level; dining room, family room, 2 fireplaces, rear deck, 2-car garage, 0.31-acre lot; taxes $4,401; listed at $629,000, 26 weeks on market (Brokers: Weichert; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)

$650,000 248 Umpawaug Road 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath colonial built in 1792; dining room, renovated kitchen with granite countertops, wide-plank floors, heated pool, 1-car garage, 2.01-acre lot; taxes $6,347; listed at $675,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$688,000 38 Shore Park Road 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 59-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, attic, finished basement, fireplace, 2-car attached garage, 100-by-102-ft. lot; taxes $9,400; listed at $729,500, 4 weeks on market (Broker: Trylon)

$425,000 245A Old Mill Road 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 22-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, office, fireplace, deck, 2-car attached garage, 2-acre lot; taxes $9,000; listed at $449,000, 20 weeks on market (Brokers: Frank Huntington; Prudential Long Island)

$270,000 179 Stratford Avenue 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 70-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, finished basement, 1-car garage, 40-by-90-ft. lot; taxes $4,000; listed at $275,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Atanas)

$250,000 365 Highwood Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 70-year-old Victorian farmhouse; eat-in kitchen, full finished basement, dining room, porch, 2-car garage, 39-by-62-ft. lot; taxes $4,556; listed at $234,500, (multiple bids), 1 week on market (Broker: Weichert)

$142,000 12 Exeter Road 4-bedroom, 2-bath, 56-year-old colonial; fireplace, finished basement, 2 parking spaces, 18-by-101-ft. lot; taxes $4,800; listed at $149,000, 8 1/2 weeks on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)

$295,000 1639 Central Avenue 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 12-year-old furnished town house condo; close to beach; fireplace, large deck, c/a, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,088; listed at $299,900, 15 1/2 weeks on market (Broker: Richards)
